Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Cup
Description: Lovely miniature cup of the Classic Kerma period with a rounded base and a wide flaring mouth ending in a tapered lip. The clay is fine, black and shiny. The wide rim is coloured black, the exterior surface of the body brick-red. Miniature vases were generally reserved for children's burials.
